name: World of Explorers PB.3!
description:
This is the download for World of Explorers Pre-beta 3! 

Note: This is not a complete game, just a in development version with public access.

World of Explorers is a sandbox adventure game for building, crafting and fighting your way through a charming endless world!

First thing you need to do is go hunt down some sticks on the floor in another biome!
If you enjoy it, check out the Discord Server to follow progress :)
https://discord.gg/3n7ytDy

We have made a whole bunch of progress since this build, so look forward to the future!

W/A/S/D and E/F are your useful buttons. Good luck!
